translations.english: The emperor said: "This is not what you know.
Chen Xi has rebelled. Zhao and Dai territories are all Xi's.

translations.chinese: 吾以羽檄 徵天下兵，未有至者，今計唯獨邯鄲中兵耳。
translations.english: I have summoned troops from the world with urgent dispatches, but none have arrived yet. Now my only hope is the troops in Handan.

translations.chinese: 吾何愛四千戶，不以慰趙子弟！」
translations.english: Why should I begrudge four thousand households? I will not use them to console the Zhao youths!"
